law.history: Repealed 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 274, sec. 165. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 15a. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 763, 764.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Organization of railroad companies -- Articles of incorporation -- Amendments to articles.
